definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.chinese: 正直的言語力量何其大。

sentences.english: The only shield to his memory is the rectitude and sincerity of his actions.
sentences.chinese: 在追憶往事時，唯一的盾牌是他的行爲正直和誠實。

sentences.english: An honest man will scorn to act a double part.
sentences.chinese: 正直的人不屑於陽奉陰違。

sentences.english: Christ's righteousness has been imputed to us.
sentences.chinese: 基督的正直轉遞給了我們。

sentences.english: When we saved Honest John and his dragoon ?
sentences.chinese: 正直的約翰和他的騎兵嗎？

sentences.english: Thepeople cried out againsttheunjust imprisonment of the honest doctor.
sentences.chinese: 人們對不公正地囚禁那位正直的醫生表示強烈不滿。

sentences.english: Integrity and the driver of the tractor repaired, small weeks without village to find schumann.
sentences.chinese: 正直和司機小周把拖拉機修好，沒有進村去找舒曼。

sentences.english: A straight man does nothing underhand.
Two-Face: You thought we could be decent men at an indecent time.
sentences.chinese: 你以爲我們可以在這個扭曲的時代作正直的人。

sentences.english: To be honest, what I've seen offends my Presbyterian conscience .
sentences.chinese: 老實說，我所看到的是和我正直的內心相違背的。

sentences.english: He and actor people speak just as facing toward an honest courtier and speaking.
sentences.chinese: 他和伶人講話就像對着一個正直的朝臣講話一樣。

sentences.english: The brothel she lived in specialized in pre-pubescent girls.
sentences.chinese: 這裏住的大多數是正直青春期的少女。

sentences.english: She was an active and constant percept for decent behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 正直，行爲積極，持久的準則。

sentences.english: But his sons did not walk in his ways. They turned aside after dishonest gain and accepted bribes and perverted justice.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子不行他的道，貪圖財利，收受賄賂，屈枉正直。

sentences.english: Integrity job-transfer was assigned to patriotic health campaign committee when vice chairman.
sentences.chinese: 正直轉業被分配到愛國衛生運動委員會當副主任。

sentences.english: You are a less man, because you're lieing to me all time.
sentences.chinese: 你是一個不太正直的人，你一直欺騙我。

definition: open and candid (idiom); straightforward and upright
not to submit to force (idiom); to defy threats and violence
